title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 464.7 - Workmen's compensation for volunteer workers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 464.7 - Workmen's compensation for volunteer workers

State Regulations

Each volunteer worker performing authorized services for
a social services district shall be insured in accordance with the provisions
of the Workmen's Compensation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
464.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
